title: Energy Minister, team representing ADB discuss bilateral investment in power sector
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 15 (APP):Caretaker Federal Minister for Energy Mr. Muhammad Ali and the team representing Asian Development Bank (ADB) here on Friday discussed bilateral investment in the power sector and the progress of the funded projects.
During the meeting with the team representing Asian Development Bank (ADB) the minister also discussed the Power sector reforms for energy efficiency and the resource management for effective reforms.
Both proposed a systematic and structured approach towards the issues of the power sector.
Overall infrastructure enhancement and improvements were also discussed in the meeting.
